name: Jurassic Survival
description: Jurassic Survival is an open-world survival game where players must cohabit with roaming dinosaurs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2 GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 - 3570K @ 3.40GHz or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 680 or higher DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: games that are in early access should be listed as early access, that's why i'm giving this a thumbs down.   This game shows a little if any potential at all, just keep working at it and make it playable and maybe it might be better than No Man's sky... actually that's a lie, everything is better than no man's sky :3
